title: Python script shebangs do not specify a version
body:
by **aaron.devore**: 
The Python scripts in the Go repository only link their shebang to the generic 'python'
executable/symlink. If the python executable points to Python 3 then the scripts may
break. Arch Linux just switched to Python 3 by default and other distributions will
eventually follow. The attached patch is against Mercurial version cb6028dd2d99+.
Attachments: 1. python2_shebang.diff (1023 bytes)
